basic.description:
A detailed study of selected plays from French theatre since 1945. Visual presentations. Semiotic approach. Cocteau, Duras, Beckett, Ionesco, Sarraute, Sartre, Koltès. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le théâtre depuis 1945

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite       (FREN230 and FREN241) or FREN221 or (FREN212 and FREN220).
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from FREN305 or FREN417
